manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enhance Your Viewing Experience IPS Panel With an IPS grade panel that produces no image distortion and minimal color shifts from different angles, you'll enjoy clear images and optimized colors and brightness to ensure you enjoy every scene at its best.

Previous page 170Hz and 1ms With a 170hz refresh rate and 1ms response time, the G2712 is meant for fast-paced video games. Wide Color Gamut With more gamut coverage, gameplay colors look realistic & refined, pushing immersion to its limits. Next page 1 Refresh and Response Time 2 Wide Color Gamut

NVIDIA G-SYNC Compatible The Perfect Refresh Rate Challenge any game without screen tearing, stuttering, flicker, or artifacts. G-SYNC compatible dynamically matches the refresh rate of the display to the frame rate of the GPU.

Previous page Sleek and Edgy RGB MSI's gaming monitors are designed to show sleek, edgy, and colorful aesthetics without being loud. Anti-Flicker Technology MSI technology provides a very comfortable viewing experience by reducing the amount of flicker. From Edge to Edge With a super narrow bezel, enjoy the best immersion possible with a multi-monitor 180-degree setup. Night Vision Let MSI's smart black tuner brighten your day by bringing out the fine details in dark areas. Next page 1 Sleek and Edgy RGB 2 Anti-Flicker Technology 3 From Edge to Edge 4 Night Vision

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best 1080p monitor for the price
reviews.reviewText: I bought this MSI monitor about 6 months ago and I have had absolutely 0 issues with it.It looks stunning.27 inches is a lot bigger than you think.High refresh rate at 165 Hz is just amazing for gaming but also for productivity work.IPS panel that accurately displays colors, although you may need to tweak some display settings until you’re happy. I just calibrated it to my iPhone’s screen.The joystick that brings up the menu is amazing and has custom quick actions like if you wanted to bring up the monitor’s crosshair which is rendered by the monitor itself not your PC.The stand is heavy duty (emphasis on heavy) and has a decently low profile base. The stand also features height adjustment, tilt, and you can spin the monitor 90 degrees if you’re into that. If you’re not into stands, this monitor also supports VESA mounting for wall mounting or a monitor arm.Furthermore you get a stunning back panel with programmable RGB. Although, the RGB only has presets and can’t be customized beyond that. I have mine set to white static leds and it’s very nice.The only thing that I noticed that I didn’t like so much but quickly got used to is that the pixels are pretty visible. As in, you can count the pixels on the monitor because of how large they are. I just chalk this up to being a side effect of having a 27 inch 1080p monitor. I’m sure the 1440p mode doesn’t have this issue.Conclusion: If you’re on the fence about getting this monitor, just get it. You won’t regret it. I myself plan to get 2 more in the future to have all 3 monitors be the same.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUPER high quality for a SUPER reasonable price!
reviews.reviewText: I was for sure going for the white aesthetic, and I was between buying 2 of the MSI for a dual monitor setup, or paying almost the same price for the ASUS. So glad that I got the dual MSI, the quality surpassed my expectations. You can tell they didn't cheap out on the stand, amazing range of motion, goes up and down, left and right, tilts the screen up and down, and fully turns sideways (landscape to portrait, and back again).There are lights on the back but not bright enough to see them unless you were looking at them, this wasn't a priority to me though. I went from Xbox to PC gaming, and I can tell a positive performance change from when I played on Xbox (2.8x the fps).10/10 recommend! Aesthetically pleasing, functionally- more than just gets the job done, exceeded my expectations

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The tv picture quality is excellent and color contrast is also excellent. I was sceptical buying this through the mail but the monitor is well insulated and wrapped for protection and came unscathed. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I was trying to find a good monitor that was white and this one is rlly good. It’s a rlly good size and there’s a lot of flexibility with how you can angle it etc. rlly easy to setup the only small issue I had was my amd software couldn’t detect it but ended up figuring it out. I really love how it looks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than real life
reviews.reviewText: Tired of seeing low quality real life? Use this monitor!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Cannot be mounted
reviews.reviewText: While this monitor is sleek, and nice. It lies about being mountable. It has the appropriate screw holes for mounting but they are recessed into the monitor so you need an adapter of some sort to be able to mount it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Missing power cord
reviews.reviewText: Came with no power cord to plug into an outlet :( instructions are not helpful at all, just a few images.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After ordering 3 times 2 times here and one time else where I finally got a good monitor their quality control is horrible and having to pack up the monitor every to send back and re order a new one was annoying. It is a nice monitor tho.
Very good experience. Ideal for gaming. Good cinematographic experience.

Parece bueno,fácil instalación para alguien que nunca ha instalado un monitor y tiene bordes súper delgados ideal para juntar 2 o 3 monitores a futuro,no le veo lo malo a este monitor actualizare la reseña cuando termine de armar la PC de primera vista buenas impresiones,solo que no me vino con la pegatina de compatibilidad con gsync lo cual le quita algo de estética pero bueno no afectará el rendimiento supongo.

I had bought two of thoses for my daughters... They both are very satisfied... It is a little expensive but it worth it. Daughters are still at university and studying 10 hours a day on those screens. Good quality screen is essential for them.

One of the only white monitors I can find with more than 144hz.It is nice compared to what I had before. I can move it up and down and angle it how I like easily.It was easily to set up and put together.
